status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

comments.comment:
I reviewed the thread above and I do see mixed feeling about this.

So, just wanted to clarify whether addressing the monitoring leaks (5702), introduce throttling to address rapid open/close region concerns (5713) and addressing the ambiguity in the flags that enables/disables this feature is even an option or not?

I can take up addressing the above two minor issues if that's an option. Also, since the default alter does not go through this path the impact to the common user should be none.

Please note that what we have is based on loose set of requirements and I sincerely think that what is lacking is rock solid testing in a production kind-of environment and having cycles to address the issues if any.

@Subbu Thanks for showing up again. On the issues, sure, would appreciate the fixes. We can't put them in the way of a 0.94RC though so I suggest removing 4213 while the above are being addressed (including the 'rock solid testing ina production kind-of environment'). I can make a branch if that will help while this stuff is being worked on?

@Subbu: How much work do you think this is?
I want to cut RC1 soon (with a week or so), do you think you can address the issues by then?
While I really like this feature (and Salesforce would definitely make use of this - or online schema update), we shouldn't ship with a feature that does not work.

One option would be to pull this only from 0.94 and then make it work in 0.96.
Comment crossing
